S04n319:2: parājitadhvajabodhisattvavimokṣajñānāvabhāsitaḥ acintyabuddhaviṣayavikurvitapratyakṣavihārī acintyabodhisattvavimokṣapratyakṣajñānābhijñaḥ acintyabodhisattvasamādhijñānāvabhāsitacittaḥ sarvakālasamavasaraṇasamādhijñānāvabhāsapratilabdhaḥ sarvasaṃjñāsaṃgatasamavasaraṇasamādhiviṣayāvabhāsitaḥ sarvajagadviśeṣavatijñānālokapratilabdhaḥ sarvatryadhvānugatagocaravihārābhimukhaḥ advayavikalpasamatānirdeśajñānaparamaḥ sarvārambaṇaprasaritajñānālokaḥ sattvaśraddhābhimukhakṣāntiviśuddhayadhimuktikośakuśalaḥ svabhāvadharmakṣāntiniścayajñānālokapratilabdhaḥ sarvatrānugatābhijñabodhisattvacaryāsvabhāvabhāvanāvirahitacittaḥ sarvajñatāvegāvivartyacitto daśabalajñānavidyudavabhāsapratilabdhaḥ dharmadhātunirghoṣābhilāṣāvitṛptacittaḥ sarvajñatāvihāragocarāvataraṇapratipatticittaḥ anantabodhisattvacaryāvyūhābhinirhāracitto'
S04n319:3: nantabodhisattvamahāpraṇidhānamaṇḍalapariśodhanacittaḥ anantamadhyalokadhātujālākṣayānugamajñānābhimukhacittaḥ anantasattvasāgaraparipākavinayāsaṃkucitacittaḥ anantabodhisattvacaryāviṣayaṃ saṃpaśyan anantalokadhātugativimātratāṃ saṃpaśyan anantalokadhātuvibhaktivicitratāṃ saṃpaśyan ananta lokadhātusūkṣmodārārambaṇāntargatāṃ saṃpaśyan anantalokadhātupratiṣṭhānasaṃjñājālavicitritāṃ saṃpaśyan anantalokadhātuvyavahāraprajñaptisaṃvṛtivimātratāṃ saṃpaśyan anantasattvādhimuktivimātratāṃ saṃpaśyan anantasattvavibhaktivimātratāṃ saṃpaśyan anantasattvaparipākavinayānugamaṃ saṃpaśyan anantasattvadikkālasaṃjñāgatavicitratāṃ saṃpaśyan kalyāṇamitrāṇyabhimukhīkurvāṇo'
S04n319:4: nupūrveṇa yena īṣāṇe janapade jayoṣmāyatano brāhmaṇaḥ,
S04n319:6: tena ca samayena jayoṣmāyatano brāhmaṇa ugraṃ tapaḥ tapyati sarvajñatāmārambaṇīkṛtya |
S04n319:9: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-mayā ārya,
S04n319:11: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n319:13: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti |
S04n319:14: tadvadatu me āryaḥ-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n319:17: etaṃ kṣuradhāramārgaṃ parvatamabhiruhya atra agnikhadāyāṃ prapata |
S04n319:19: atha khalu sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya etadabhavat-durlabhā aṣṭākṣaṇavinivṛttiḥ |
S04n319:30: mā haivāyaṃ māro bhaviṣyati mārādhiṣṭhito vā mārakāyiko vā kalyāṇamitrapratirūpako vā bodhisattvakhaṇḍako vā,
S04n319:34: mā khalu māṃ viṣameṇa pathā praṇetukāmaḥ |
S04n319:35: mā khalu me dharmamukhāntarāyaṃ kartukāmo buddhadharmādhigamāya |
S04n319:36: tasyaivaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayuktasya daśa brahmasahasrāṇyuparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ-mā kulaputra evaṃ cetanāṃ dṛḍhīkārṣīḥ |
S04n319:37: eṣa kulaputra āryo vajrārciḥsamādhyavabhāsalabdhaḥ avivartyavīryo mahārambhottāraṇapratipannaḥ,
S04n319:46: pañcatapastapyamānasya yāvantaḥ kecidbrāhmaṇāḥ kartṛtvamīśvaratvaṃ sarvalokajyeṣṭhatvamātmani manyante vividhadṛṣṭigatābhiniviṣṭāḥ tasya asamogratapovratasamādānaprabhāveṇa sarve svabhavaneṣu na ramante |
S04n319:49: tāneṣa āgatānṛddhayanubhāvenābhibhūya ugravratatapasā ca tebhyaḥ sarvadṛṣṭigatavinivartanāya sarvamānamadaprahāṇāya ca dharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n319:50: sarvajaganmahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāspharaṇatāyai bodhyāśayadṛḍhīkaraṇatāyai bodhicittotpādavipulakaraṇatāyai sarvabuddhasaṃdarśanābhimukhatāyai buddhasvaramaṇḍalapratilambhaparipūraṇāya sarvatrānuravaṇabuddhaghoṣāpratighātānāvaraṇatāyai ca dharmaṃ deśayati ||
S04n319:51: daśa ca mārasahasrāṇyuparyantarīkṣe sthitvā divyairmaṇiratnairabhyavakīrya evamāhuḥ-asya kulaputra,
S04n319:54: te vayaṃ saṃvegajātāḥ saparivārāḥ etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāma |
S04n319:57: yathā svacittapratilabdhā bodhāya cittamutpādya avinivartanīyā bhavāmo'
S04n319:59: daśa ca vaśavartidevarājasahasrāṇi divyaiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrya evamāhuḥ-vayaṃ kulaputra,
S04n319:60: asya pañcatapastapyataḥ svabhavaneṣu ratiṃ na vindāmaḥ |
S04n319:63: sarvakleśavaśitāpratilābhāya yathābhiprāyopapattivaśitāpratilābhāya sarvakarmāvaraṇaviśuddhivaśitāpratilābhāya sarvasamāpattivaśavartitāpratilābhāya pariṣkāravaśitāvyūhapariśuddhaye yathābhiprāyavaśavartitāyai ca dharmaṃ deśayati ||
S04n319:64: daśa ca sunirmitadevarājasahasrāṇyuparyantarikṣe sthitvā divyasaṃgītaprayoganirnādamadhuranirghoṣeṇa pūjāṃ kṛtvā evamāhuḥ- etasya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo'
S04n319:71: vayamapīdānīṃ sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivārā na kāmeṣu ratiṃ vindāmaḥ |
S04n319:75: cittaprabhāsvaratāyai cittakalyāṇatāyai cittakarmaṇyatāyai cittaprītisaṃjananatāyai daśabalajñānapratilābhaviśuddhaye mahādharmavegavivardhanatayai kāyaviśuddhaye apramāṇabuddhakāyābhinirharaṇatāyai vāgviśuddhaye tathāgataghoṣapratilābhāya cittaviśuddhaye sarvajñatāpratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayati ||
S04n319:76: daśa ca saṃtuṣitadevarājasahasrāṇi sadevaputrāpsaragaṇoparivārāṇi uparyantarikṣe sthitvā sarvagandhacūrṇameghavarṣamabhipravṛṣya pūjayitvā namaskṛtya evamāhuḥ-asya kulaputra,
S04n319:80: saṃtuṣṭicittatāyai cittaparituṣṭitāyai kuśalamūlasaṃjananatāyai bodhicittotpādapratilābhāya yāvatsarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dharmaṃ deśayati ||
S04n319:81: daśa ca suyāmadevarājasahasrāṇi sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivārāṇi divyāni māndāravakusumavarṣāṇyabhipravṛṣya evamāhuḥ- asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya asmākaṃ divyasaṃgītiṣu ratirna bhavati |
S04n319:83: tata eṣo'smākamupasaṃkrāntānāṃ sarvakāmarativinivartanatāyai yāvatsarvabuddhadharmapratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayati ||
S04n319:84: daśa ca śakradevendraśatasahasrāṇi pratyekaṃ dvātriṃśadbhirupendraiḥ sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivāraiḥ sārdhaṃ divyavastraratnābharaṇakusumameghavarṣamabhipravṛtya evamāhuḥ-asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya asmākaṃ sarvaśakrabhavanodyānakrīḍāvanadivyatūryatālopacārasaṃgītiparibhogeṣu ratirna bhavati |
S04n319:89: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra asya saṃprekṣitena imāni meruśikharāṇi saṃprakampitāni |
S04n319:90: te vayaṃ vyathitasaṃvignacittāḥ sarvajñatācittotpādanadṛḍhatayā sarvajñatājñāne praṇidhimabhinirharāmaḥ ||
S04n319:91: daśa ca nāgasahasrāṇi airāvatanandopanandanāgarājapramukhāni uparyantarikṣe gatāni divyakālānusāricandanameghairnāgakanyāsaṃgītinirnādamadhuranirghoṣairdivyagandhodakadhārāprasṛtapramuktairabhipravṛṣya evamāhuḥ-asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo mahāgniskandharāśibhya ābhāḥ pramuktāḥ sarvanāgabhavanānyavabhāsya vālikāvarṣasuparṇibhayānyapanayanti |
S04n319:92: krodhapravṛttiṃ caiṣāṃ praśamayitvā āśayaṃ prahlādya manaḥ prasādayanti |
S04n319:95: atyayaṃ deśayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati ||
S04n319:96: daśa ca yakṣendrasahasrāṇi gaganatale sthitvā nānāvidhayā pūjayā pūjayitvā jayoṣmāyatanaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sudhanaṃ ca śreṣṭhidārakamevamāhuḥ-asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya asmatpārṣadānāṃ manuṣyeṣu maitraṃ cittaṃ saṃjāyate |
S04n319:98: te maitracittā aviheṭhanapratipannā asmatsakāśamupasaṃkrāmanti-vayamapīdānīṃ maitryādhipatyenābhibhūtāḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhavaneṣu ratiṃ na vindāmaḥ |
S04n319:100: tadasmākamupasaṃkrāntānāmasya śarīraniryātā prabhā avabhāsya sarvaśarīraṃ sukhena spharati |
S04n319:101: sa eṣo'smākaṃ prīṇitakāyacittānāṃ tathā dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04n319:103: daśa ca gandharvendrasahasrāṇyuparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ-asmākamapi kulaputra svabhavaneṣu vasatāmasya pañcatapastapyata ebhyo'
S04n319:105: te vayaṃ tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭā acintyasukhasamarpitā etasyāntikamupasaṃkramāmaḥ |
S04n319:110: daśa ca asurendrasahasrāṇi mahāsamudrādabhyudgamya ākāśe dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalamavanāmyakṛtāñjalipuṭāni namasyamānāni evamāhuḥ-asya kulaputra,
S04n319:113: suralokāḥ sasāgarāṇi saśailāni ca mahāpṛthivīmaṇḍalāni prakampante |
S04n319:114: tato vayaṃ save nihatamānamadadarpā vratatapobhibhūtā etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ |
S04n319:116: smākaṃ sarvamāyāśāṭhyaprahāṇāya gambhīradharmakṣāntyavatārāya acaladharmatāpratiṣṭhānāya daśabalajñānapariniṣpattaye ca dharmaṃ deśayati ||
S04n319:117: daśa ca garuḍendrasahasrāṇi mahāvegadhārigaruḍendrapramukhāni udāraṃ māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāya evamāhuḥ-asya kulaputra,
S04n319:129: daśa ca kinnarendrasahasrāṇi uparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ-asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyato vāyusamīritābhyo'
S04n319:133: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma bodhisattvo bodhāya praṇidadhāti |
S04n319:134: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma bodhisattvo duṣkaraparityāgaṃ karoti |
S04n319:137: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmevaṃnāmā bodhisattvo savāhanaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate |
S04n319:141: aparyantaḥ kulaputra bhavejjambudvīpe sarvatṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatrapalāśānāṃ paramāṇubhāgaśaḥ paricchinnānām,
S04n319:142: na tveva teṣāṃ tathāgatanāmnāṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhīnāṃ bodhisattvacaryāprasthānaviśeṣāṇām,
S04n319:148: yadasmatpariṣadi aneke sattvā avivartyā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ ||
S04n319:149: aparimāṇāni ca kāmāvacaradevaputrasahasrāṇyudārodāravarṇānyākāśe sthitvā manomayyā pūjayā pūjayitvā evamāhuḥ-asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo'
S04n319:151: yayā prabhayā avīciparyantān sarvanirayānavabhāsya sarvanairayikasattvaduḥkhāni pratiprasrabdhāni |
S04n319:153: te vayamasyopari cittāni prasādayitvā praṇīteṣu kāmāvacaradevanikāyeṣūpapannāḥ |
S04n319:154: ye vayamasya kṛtajñatayā darśanenāvitṛptāḥ sarvakāmaratimutsṛjya asya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ |
S04n319:158: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ imamevaṃ rūpaṃ dharmanayaṃ śrutvā jayoṣmāyanate brāhmaṇe bhūtakalyāṇamitrāsaṃjñāmutpādya jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evamāha-atyayamatyayato deśayāmyārya yo'
S04n319:160: atha khalu jayoṣmāyatano brāhmaṇaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣata—
S04n319:161: pradakṣiṇaṃ ya bodhisattva ānuśāsti kurvatī na kāṅkṣaye gurubhya ekadhā sthapitva mānasam |
S04n319:163: pi ca pradakṣiṇāḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ ca buddhajñānu bodhimūli budhyate || 1 ||
S04n319:165: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastaṃ kṣuradhārācitaṃ parvataprapātamārgamabhiruhya tatra mahāgniskandhe prāpatat |
S04n319:166: tena prapatatā supratiṣṭhito nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ |
S04n319:167: tena cāgnisparśanena praśamasukhābhijño nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ |
S04n319:174: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ tejoraśmikalpānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvajagatkleśadṛṣṭiparyādattapraṇidhānānāmapratyudāvartyaketūnāmaparyādattahṛdayānāmadīnacittānāmasaṃkucitamānasānāṃ vajragarbhanārāyaṇakalpānāṃ mahārambhottaraṇāviṣaṇṇānāmaśithilaprayogānāṃ vātamaṇḍalīkalpānāṃ sarvajagadarthaprayuktānāmavivartyavīryāṇāmapratyudāvartyasaṃnāhānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum?
S04n319:182: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya jayoṣmāyatanaṃ brāhmaṇamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasyāntikātprakāntaḥ ||10 ||
